info.name: TroUni Complete API Collection - Enhanced
info.description:
Complete API collection for TroUni with ALL endpoints - Enhanced with comprehensive test cases and variable management

Includes ALL controllers: Auth, User, Profile, Email Verification, Room, Bookmark, Roommate Posts, Reports, Reviews, Room Images, Master Amenities

Features:
- Comprehensive test cases for each API
- Automatic variable setting and management
- Response validation
- Error handling tests
- Performance monitoring
